title: Elden Ring Movie or Show Teased By George R. R. Martin - Kinda Funny Games Daily 07.01.24
description:
Over 500 games and apps use AI-powered NVIDIA DLSS! Here's the latest: https://www.nvidia.com/en-us/geforce/news/dlss-payday-3-riven-tribes-3-kristala 

This episode is sponsored by BetterHelp — go to http://betterhelp.com/kindafunny to get 10% off your first month.

We’re here to talk about video game news!

Time Stamps:
00:00:00 - Start
00:08:46 - Housekeeping
 - Today after, KFGD, you’ll get:
     - GAMESCAST - a conversation about the Review Scale
     - The STREAM is Fragpunk
 - If you’re a Kinda Funny Member:
     - You can get today’s Gregway.
               -   The Roper Report   -
00:11:59 - George R. R. Martin Teases Elden Ring Movie or TV Series
00:23:09 - Nintendo says it wants to avoid Switch 2 scalping by making enough to meet demand
00:34:16 - Sega's new Crazy Taxi game will be open-world and "massively multiplayer"
00:46:21 - Metal Gear Solid Movie Script Still Being Worked On, Producer Says
00:49:16 - Wee News!
00:51:49 - SuperChats
00:53:51 - You‘re Wrong
